title: FS: N162 Mike King Kelly PSA 1 - Price Reduced
author: TheKid41

posts.post_title: FS: N162 Mike King Kelly PSA 1 - Price Reduced
posts.post_content:
Hi Everyone,

Nice low grade N162 Goodwin Champions Mike Kelly. Some paper loss on the front and back, otherwise very vibrant, intact example of this classic card.

Lowered to $950. 

Please feel free to contact me with serious offers or if you have any questions.

Thanks again,
Mike

Hey everyone. Bringing my asking price down. Open to serious offers as well. 

Thanks!
Mike
Lowered again to $950. Feel free to email me with any questions at [url]mikewolf.nyc@gmail.com[/url]  Thx!
